version_description: Optimizations

We've found a display issue of the pop-up interface when players wish to demolish the alliance buildings. The "confirm" and "cancel" buttons were not properly displayed. This bug has been fixed in the new version 1.0.8.

What’s NEW
- Deals of the Day!
- Alliance Gift Chest!
- In Game Mod System!
- Kingdom UI!
- New Event!

Optimizations
- Item Store

The following issues have been fixed in version 1.1.2
- You can now research in the Academy again!
- UI display issue after gathering resources
- Halloween skin not being visible has been fixed
- The Event Center now show the event names

- Recruitment Hall!
- The Guard!

- Advent Calendar Event!
